article.title: Harris Receives Funding for Tactical Air Control Modernization
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Air Force Tactical Air Control Party Modernization

article.text: Harris Corporation, Rochester, New York, is being awarded an approximate $29 million firm-fixed-price delivery order for support to the Air Force Tactical Air Control Party Modernization Program.Â The equipment being purchased includes the AN/PRC-117G man-pack radio and accessories. Naval Surface Warfare Center Crane Division, Crane, Indiana, is the contracting activity.
